body.p: You must perform RAID configuration manually, using the option ROM for the RAID controller. For more information on configuring your controller please see the Dell PowerEdge RAID Controller (PERC) 9 Userâ€™s Guide.

ul.li: Infrastructure nodes should be set as RAID 10, spanning all drives on the system.
Data nodes should be set as Raid 1 for the two Flex Bay Drives of the system and HBA pass through (JBOD) for the data drives.
